sourcesContent:
<template>
    <swiper :options="swiperOption" class="horizontal-scroll-page">
      <swiper-slide v-for="item in items" :key="item.id">
        <component :is="item.component"></component>
      </swiper-slide>
    </swiper>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'vue-awesome-swiper';
  import 'swiper/swiper-bundle.css';
  
  export default {
    name: 'HorizontalScrollPage',
    components: {
      Swiper,
      SwiperSlide
    },
    props: {
      items: {
        type: Array,
        default: () => []
      },
      swiperOption: {
        type: Object,
        default: () => ({
          direction: 'horizontal',
          slidesPerView: 'auto',
          freeMode: true,
          scrollbar: {
            el: '.swiper-scrollbar',
            draggable: true
          },
          mousewheel: true
        })
      }
    }
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .horizontal-scroll-page {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  </style>
